sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>

    <cus-page-title-back :isDialog="true" :label="$t('i18nView.pdComCalcFormulaDef')" @backTo="back"/>

    <el-form disabled label-width="auto">
      <el-row :gutter="10" justify="space-between" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="6">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.pdBnftCtrlLimLevel')">
            <cus-select v-model="displayForm.pdBnftCtrlLimLevel" codetype="limitlevel"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="6">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.controlCode')">
            <el-tag type="info">{{ displayForm.pdBnftCtrlCode }}</el-tag>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="6">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdBussDetailType')">
            <cus-select v-model="displayForm.calcDetailType" codetype="ruleBusinessDetailClass"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>

    <!-- 已选择公式 -->
    <cus-form-title :first="true" :label="$t('i18nView.selectComFormula')"></cus-form-title>
    <cus-table-title :label="$t('i18nView.pdComCalcFormula')"/>
    <el-table :data="tableDataCurrent" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit highlight-current-row max-height="300"
              size="mini" @row-click="rowClick">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.select')" width="55">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-radio-group v-model="selectedFormula" @change="selectedFormulaChanged">
            <el-radio :label="scope.row">{{ '' }}</el-radio>
          </el-radio-group>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" width="50">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ initTableIndex('page_current', scope.$index) }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.detail')" align="center" min-width="200" width="100">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button dialog-disable="disable" size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.CalcFormulaType')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBussDetailType">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcCode')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdCalcCode">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcDesc')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdCalcDesc">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.ruleAttr')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" fixed="right" width="120">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <cus-del-btn v-auth="'compensationFormula:delete'" @ok="deleteFormula(scope.row)"></cus-del-btn>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page_current" v-model="tableDataCurrent" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5"
                    :params="params_current" url="/compensationFormula/base/currentFormula"/>

    <!-- 可选择公式 -->
    <cus-form-title :first="true" :label="$t('i18nView.optionComFormula')"></cus-form-title>

    <el-row style="text-align: right">
      <el-button dialog-disable="disable" icon="el-icon-connection" size="small" type="primary"
                 @click="toFormulaSelect">
        {{ $t('rule.moreFormula') }}
      </el-button>
      <el-button dialog-disable="disable" icon="el-icon-circle-plus el-icon--left" size="small" type="primary"
                 @click="toAddFormula">
        {{ $t('rule.toAddFormula') }}
      </el-button>
    </el-row>

    <cus-table-title :label="$t('i18nView.comCalcFormula')"/>
    <el-table :data="tableDataBrief" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit highlight-current-row max-height="300"
              size="mini">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" width="50">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ initTableIndex('page_brief', scope.$index) }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.detail')" align="center" width="100">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button dialog-disable="disable" size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.CalcFormulaType')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBussDetailType">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcCode')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdCalcCode">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcDesc')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdCalcDesc">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.ruleAttr')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" fixed="right" width="120">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button v-auth="'compensationFormula:associate'" dialog-disable="disable" icon="el-icon-connection"
                     size="mini" type="primary" @click="handleSelectFormula(scope.row)">
            {{ $t('form.select') }}
          </el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page_brief" v-model="tableDataBrief" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5"
                    :params="params_brief" url="/compensationFormula/base/briefFormula"/>

    <!-- 规则引擎公式定义弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-definition :attributeObj="attributeObj" :ruleDefinitionClosed="ruleModuleClosed"
                         :visible="formulaVisible"></cus-rule-definition>

    <!-- 公式查看和决策树编辑弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-modify :flag="formulaView.flag" :performType="formulaView.performType" :ruleCode="formulaView.ruleCode"
                     :ruleModifyClosed="formulaViewClosed" :ruleType="'2'"
                     :visible="formulaView.visible"></cus-rule-modify>

  </cus-wraper>
</template>

<script>

import {associate, deleteFormula, getCalcCode} from "@/api/basicinfo/productCompensation"

let _this

export default {
  name: 'compensationFormula',
  filters: {
    filter_pdBussDetailType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('ruleBusinessDetailClass', code)
    }
  },
  props: {
    displayForm: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    }
  },
  data() {
    _this = this
    return {
      formulaVisible: false,
      attributeObj: {},
      formulaView: {
        flag: '',
        performType: '',
        ruleCode: '',
        visible: false
      },
      params_current: {
        pdInfoId: undefined,
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdBussDetailType: this.displayForm.calcDetailType,
        pdBussCode: this.displayForm.pdBnftCtrlCode,
        pdType: '1'
      },
      params_brief: {
        product: undefined,
        pdBussId: this.displayForm.pdtempClmCtrlLimId,
        productDetailType: '',
        pdBussDetailType: this.displayForm.calcDetailType
      },
      tableDataCurrent: [],
      tableDataBrief: [],
      selectedFormula: {},
      product: {
        id: undefined,
        bType: '',
        cType: '',
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdSalechnl: '',
        pdName: '',
        pdShortname: '',
        pdEnName: '',
        pdShortEnName: '',
        operator: '',
        pdStartDateRule: '',
        pdStartDateMode: '',
        pdStartPeriod: undefined,
        pdStartPeriodUnit: '',
        pdEndDateRule: '',
        pdEndDateMode: '',
        pdEndPeriod: undefined,
        pdEndPeriodUnit: '',
        pdGracePeriod: undefined,
        pdObservationDay: undefined,
        pdApplDate: undefined,
        pdProcessId: undefined,
        pdStartDate: undefined,
        pdStopDate: undefined,
        createTime: undefined,
        updateTime: undefined
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
  },
  created() {
    const product = this.getPdData()
    if (Object.keys(product).length > 0) {
      Object.assign(this.product, product)
      this.params_current.pdInfoId = this.product.id
      this.params_current.pdVerId = this.product.pdVerId
      this.params_brief.product = this.product
      this.params_brief.productDetailType = this.product.cType
      this.$nextTick(() => {
        this.$refs.page_current.reload()
        this.$refs.page_brief.reload()
      })
    } else {
      this.notifyError(this.$t('message.invalidProductInfo'))
    }
  },
  methods: {
    showFormula(row) {
      this.formulaView.flag = '1'
      this.formulaView.performType = row.performType
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = row.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    ruleModuleClosed() {
      this.formulaVisible = false
      this.$refs.page_brief.reload()
    },
    formulaViewClosed() {
      this.formulaView.visible = false
      this.selectedFormula = {}
    },
    back() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_formula', false)
    },
    toFormulaSelect() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_formulaSelect', true)
    },
    rowClick(row, column, event) {
      if (event.target.nodeName === "INPUT") {
        if (row.id === this.selectedFormula.id) {
          this.selectedFormula = {}
        }
      }
    },
    selectedFormulaChanged() {
      this.formulaView.flag = this.selectedFormula.ruleAttr === '1' ? '1' : '2'
      this.formulaView.performType = this.selectedFormula.performType
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = this.selectedFormula.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    deleteFormula(row) {
      deleteFormula(row).then(() => {
        this.notifySuccess(this.$t('successMessage.delete'))
        this.$refs.page_current.reload()
        this.$refs.page_brief.reload()
        this.$emit('bringCalcCode', row.pdBussCode, undefined)
      })
    },
    toAddFormula() {
      const param = {
        pdBussType: '',
        pdBussDetailType: this.displayForm.calcDetailType
      }
      switch (this.displayForm.calcDetailType) {
        case "54":
        case "55":
        case "56":
        case "57":
        case "58":
        case "59":
          param.pdBussType = '10'
          break
        case "22":
        case "23":
        case "24":
        case "25":
        case "26":
        case "50":
        case "51":
        case "52":
        case "53":
        case "63":
        case "64":
        case "65":
          param.pdBussType = '2'
          break
      }
      getCalcCode(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        this.attributeObj = {
          code: response.data,
          ruleBussModu: String(param.pdBussType),
          ruleBussModuDeta: String(param.pdBussDetailType),
          ruleType: '2',
          pdType: '1',
          riskType: this.product.bType,
          riskDetail: this.product.cType,
          pdCode: this.product.pdCode,
          pdEdition: this.product.pdEdition
        }
        this.formulaVisible = true
      })
    },
    handleSelectFormula(row) {
      let pdtempPdCalc = {
        pdInfoId: this.product.id,
        pdVerId: this.product.pdVerId,
        pdType: '',
        pdCode: this.product.pdCode,
        pdBussType: '',
        pdBussDetailType: this.displayForm.calcDetailType,
        pdBussId: this.displayForm.pdtempClmCtrlLimId,
        pdBussCode: this.displayForm.pdBnftCtrlCode,
        pdStructureType: '',
        pdCalcCode: row.pdCalcCode,
        pdCalcDesc: row.pdCalcDesc
      }
      switch (this.displayForm.calcDetailType) {
        case "54":
        case "55":
        case "56":
        case "57":
        case "58":
        case "59":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdBussType = '10'
          break
        case "22":
        case "23":
        case "24":
        case "25":
        case "26":
        case "50":
        case "51":
        case "52":
        case "53":
        case "63":
        case "64":
        case "65":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdBussType = '2'
          break
      }
      switch (this.displayForm.pdBnftCtrlLimLevel) {
        case "1":
        case "2":
        case "12":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '15'
          break
        case "3":
        case "4":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '16'
          break
        case "5":
        case "6":
        case "11":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '18'
          break
        case "7":
        case "8":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '13'
          break
        case "9":
        case "10":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '14'
          break
        case "13":
        case "14":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '12'
          break
      }
      const param = {
        selectedFormula: row,
        pdtempPdCalc: pdtempPdCalc,
        product: this.product,
        pdBussType: pdtempPdCalc.pdBussType,
        pdBussDetailType: this.displayForm.calcDetailType,
        needChecking: true
      }
      associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        let flag = response.data.flag
        let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
        if (flag === true) {
          this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
          this.$refs.page_current.reload()
          this.$refs.page_brief.reload()
          this.$emit('bringCalcCode', this.displayForm.pdBnftCtrlCode, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
        } else {
          this.$confirm(String(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.confirm_overwrite_formula')), String(this.$t('confirmMessage.tip')), {
            confirmButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.confirm')),
            cancelButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.cancel')),
            type: 'warning'
          }).then(() => {
            param.needChecking = false
            associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
              let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
              this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
              this.$refs.page_current.reload()
              this.$refs.page_brief.reload()
              this.$emit('bringCalcCode', this.displayForm.pdBnftCtrlCode, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
            })
          }).catch(() => {
            this.messageInfo(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.canceled'))
          })
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
